subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Wolverines rallied from a 19-point halftime deficit Saturday, and when Wisconsin failed on an attempted 2-point-conversion, Michigan sealed a victory against the ninth-ranked Badgers.
snippet: The Wolverines rallied from a 19-point halftime deficit Saturday, and when Wisconsin failed on an attempted 2-point-conversion, Michigan sealed a victory against the ninth-ranked Badgers.
